data.message: How could you love someone if you don't know them? But anyway we have a serious serious problem here with the  Facebook app for iPhone having trouble posting photos both on Facebook Pages app and Facebook app and serious question? When ever you update something on Facebook you screw something else up why?

replies.message: Hi Josh. We love everyone for being part of our community.  It's possible you may be experiencing a bug. The more detail you provide the better. Can you please report it at: http://on.fb.me/18dEFaD. -Chantal
I already did that shake if you have a problem thing and I sent you two screenshots
And you don't think that they don't know this problem exists? I'm sure they do
